documents.text:
--- Visit 1 | Date: 2025-06-24 ---

Patient SA-P010 presents for scheduled cycle 1 visit.

VS: 137/87 | HR 91 | Wt 86.2 kg. Patient comfortable, no distress noted.

New AE: Thrombocytopenia. Severity: severe (Grade 3). Onset: day 2. Resolved by day 8. Relatedness: unlikely. Study drug dose was reduced per protocol guidelines.

Lab panel results from today's draw:
  - PSA: 8.47 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0] (HIGH)
  - ALT: 37.01 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 37.13 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 11.55 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5] (LOW)
  - WBC: 6.28 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 0.96 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3]

Continue study protocol. Monitor labs. Return visit 2 scheduled in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 2 | Date: 2025-07-15 ---

Visit 2 clinical encounter for SA-P010.

Vitals: BP 120/81 mmHg, HR 80 bpm, Weight 102.7 kg.

Lab panel results from today's draw:
  - PSA: 8.55 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0] (HIGH)
  - ALT: 38.29 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 37.06 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 11.1 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5] (LOW)
  - WBC: 5.71 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 1.03 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3]

Imaging assessment (CT chest/abdomen/pelvis): Complete response — no measurable disease identified. All previously noted target lesions have resolved. Classified as CR per RECIST 1.1.

PSA level is 1.11 ng/mL (decrease 70.4% from baseline).

Plan: Continue therapy per protocol with supportive medications. Return for cycle 3 in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 3 | Date: 2025-08-05 ---

Routine protocol visit 3. Patient ID: SA-P010.

Vitals: BP 111/76 mmHg, HR 93 bpm, Weight 82.5 kg.

ANC decreased — Grade 4 neutropenia identified on day 51 labs. Currently ongoing. No dose modification required.

Laboratory results:
  - PSA: 6.48 ng/mL [ref 0.0-4.0] (HIGH)
  - ALT: 35.71 U/L [ref 7.0-56.0]
  - AST: 37.69 U/L [ref 10.0-40.0]
  - Hemoglobin: 11.02 g/dL [ref 12.0-17.5] (LOW)
  - WBC: 5.83 10^3/uL [ref 4.5-11.0]
  - Creatinine: 1.08 mg/dL [ref 0.7-1.3]

Plan: Continue current regimen. Follow up in 3 weeks.

--- Visit 4 | Date: 2025-08-26 ---

Scheduled visit 4 was not completed. voicemail left.

--- Visit 5 | Date: 2025-09-16 ---

Scheduled visit 5 was not completed. patient reported feeling too unwell to travel to site.

Patient removed from study protocol following confirmed disease progression on latest imaging. Referred to alternate treatment pathway.

--- Visit 6 | Date: 2025-10-07 ---

Patient did not present for scheduled visit 6. Attempted phone contact — no answer.

--- Visit 7 | Date: 2025-10-28 ---

Patient did not present for scheduled visit 7. Attempted phone contact — spoke with patient, rescheduling.

--- Visit 8 | Date: 2025-11-18 ---

Visit 8 — MISSED. Patient called to reschedule but did not attend. voicemail left.
